Tired of endlessly searching the web for upcoming esports tournaments? The new Stride.gg Extension for OperaGx brings all the biggest tournaments together in one place so you never miss the action.
 
This handy extension automatically aggregates schedules, brackets, streams and results from all the top leagues and events so you can easily stay updated. Whether you love Fortnite, Valorant, Rocket League, Fall Guys or any other popular title, you'll get alerts on every upcoming match.
 
No more clicking around to find tournaments - this extension delivers everything straight to your browser. It's the ultimate tool for esports fans who want an effortless way to track their favorite teams and players.
 
The Stride.gg Extension eliminates wasted time so you can catch more live matches. Download now to enhance your viewing experience!
